description:
Ringo focuses on developing the item Tsukasa requested while he endures the weight of that request. Shinobu continues to gather information, but shows concern for Jeanne when she uncovers the Azure Brigade`s suspicious activity. Meanwhile, a plague strikes the city. Its treatment is beyond the doctors of this other world, and with the group`s reserves of medical supplies running low, the patients are facing the risk of death.
When the local Medical Guild comes to insult the Seven-Light Faith for failing to save their patients, Akatsuki gets mad. That`s when the world`s greatest doctor, Kanzaki Keine responds to his spirit and declares that she will make medicine to save them all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Seems Keine Can`t Stand Naughty Boys!
Keine ne pardonne pas aux vilains petits garnements !
Keine wa Warui Ko o Keshite Yurushitari wa Shinai You Desu!
يبدو أن كاين لن تسامح الأشخاص الأشقياء!
桂音は悪い子を決して許したりはしないようです!
